name: pnfged

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cpnf), wcel(c0, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))

|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cpnf))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))

comment: Plus infinity is an upper bound for extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
